mapper.select: select ows.id, ows.out_wh_id outWhId,sg.group_name groupName, c.color_name colorName,ows.qty, ifnull(ows.already_out_wh_qty, 0) qcQty, true idClass from ope_out_wh_scooter_b ows left join ope_specificat_group sg on ows.group_id = sg.id and sg.dr = 0 left join ope_color c on ows.color_id = c.id and c.dr = 0 where ows.dr = 0 and ows.out_wh_id = #{outWhId}

select ows.id, ows.out_wh_id outWhId,sg.group_name groupName, c.color_name colorName,ows.qty, ifnull(ows.already_out_wh_qty, 0) qcQty, true idClass from ope_out_wh_scooter_b ows left join ope_specificat_group sg on ows.group_id = sg.id and sg.dr = 0 left join ope_color c on ows.color_id = c.id and c.dr = 0 where ows.dr = 0 and ows.id = #{productId}
select sp.group_name from ope_out_wh_scooter_b s inner join ope_specificat_group sp on s.group_id = sp.id and sp.dr = 0 where s.dr = 0 and s.id = #{id}
